Tester.name: Content languages and ontologies
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the JADE support for user defined content languages and ontologies included in the jade.content package

Tester.name: SL Operators
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the usage of the SL operators such as logical operators (AND, OR, NOT) and modal operators (B, I, U).

Tester.name: Inter Platform Communication
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to agent communication across different platforms.

Tester.name: Behaviours block/restart
Tester.Description: This item includes tests aimed at stressing the behaviour block/restart mechanism

Tester.name: Behaviour performance
Tester.Description: This item includes tests that measures the performances of the behaviour scheduling (including addition/remotion) mechanism

Tester.name: AMS
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the actions that can be requested to the AMS

Tester.name: DF
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the Yellow Pages service provided by the DF agent according to the FIPA specifications

Tester.name: Persistence_DF
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the persistence of Yellow Pages service provided by the DF agent.

Tester.name: JADE Management Ontology
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the actions included in the JADEManagementOntology such as CreateAgent and KillAgent

Tester.name: Mobility
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to agent mobility

Tester.name: ContractNet Protocol
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the support for the Contract Net interaction protocol

Tester.name: AchieveRE Protocol
Tester.Description: This item includes tests related to the support for "FIPA-request like" interaction protocols

Tester.name: Communication performance and scalability
Tester.Description: This item includes tests that measure the performances of the message transport mechanism for different types of communication (intra-container, inter-container, inter-platform...)
